doc.title: 邹志强
doc.body: (中文版)研究方向及主要成果 目前的主要研究方向为网络体系结构、面向网络的软件应用技术、分布式异构空间信息处理和传感器网络。主要研究内容是大规模动态网络环境下网络结构分析、协议设计、性能分析方法、分布式环境下网络的应用、多维数据的网络索引算法以及传感器网络的优化算法等。近期在国内外重要学术刊物和会议上发表论文近20篇，国家发明专利5项。(English Version)Research Interest & Main resultsHis current research interests include network architectures, distributed heterogeneous spatial information indexes, computational social science and Wireless Sensor Networks. The main research contents include Large-scale network structure analysis under dynamic environment, Protocol design, performance analysis method, Network applications in distributed environments, multidimensional data distributed indexing algorithm, optimization algorithms for Sensor network and so on. He has published more than twenty papers, in which are most indexed by SCI or EI. And he received more than five patents.
